data.title: Beasley Broadcast Group Inc Company Profile - Beasley Broadcast Group Inc Overview
data.meta_description: Up-to-date Beasley Broadcast Group Inc company overview including funding information, company profile, key statistics, peer comparison and more.
data.text: Beasley Broadcast Group Inc (BBG) is a multi-platform media company that operates radio stations. The company's main activities include providing integrated marketing solutions across audio, digital, and event platforms to local and national advertisers. BMG's services encompass audio technology, esports, podcasting, e-commerce, and events. BMG's services are utilized for advertising and digital marketing purposes. The companyâ€™s FM (frequency modulation) and AM (amplitude modulation) stations are located across the US including Boston, Atlanta, Augusta, Charlotte, Fayetteville and Fort Myers-Naples. Geographically, the company has business presence across the US. BBG is headquartered in Naples, Florida, the US.
